result.execSummary:
The defendant Jarrod P. HETUE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Maintain Drug Trafficking Place, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.42(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Provide DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jarrod P. HETUE

records.addlTxt:
Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 8-13-2015 at 3:30 pm

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 07-09-15 at 3:30 p.m.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.   Preliminary hearing is set for 05-20-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody on arrest warrant.  The matter is continued for an initial appearance on 05-04-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, maintain absolute sobriety and have no illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia in the residence.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.  
Arrest warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
RE:  Maintain drug trafficking place-2nd and subsequent offense, on 03-02-15.
Affidavit of Detective Sgt. Peter McGinty, Two Rivers Police Department.
At 9:54 a.m., search warrant for 6506 County Road B, Manitowoc, WI with return of officer thereon.
Search warrant issued.  RE:  6506 County Road B, Manitowoc, WI occupied by Jerrod Hetue.
